name: todo-app-tauri
description: App de Lista de Tarefas para Android com Tauri

scripts.android:init: cd src-tauri && cargo tauri android init
scripts.android:dev: cd src-tauri && cargo tauri android dev
scripts.android:build: cd src-tauri && cargo tauri android build
scripts.android:build:release: cd src-tauri && cargo tauri android build --release

author: Desenvolvedor
